Description:
Low Maintenance Living!
This is a perfect home for those looking for low maintenance living and will suit first home buyers or those looking to downsize or invest. New carpet throughout, it comprises two bedrooms with built in robes, central bathroom, kitchen overlooking meals and living room plus a single garage. Located close to parkland, public transport, minutes walk to Corio Village shopping centre, and easy access to the Geelong ring road. Just move in with nothing to do, this unit is a must see!

Description:
Perfect Opportunity
If you are a first home owner, an astute investor or looking to renovate, here is the perfect opportunity. Situated on an approximate allotment of 594m2 with easy access to all amenities, public transport, schools, shopping centre and a great location for access to the Melbourne road for the day trip to Melbourne. The home offers you a light filled front living area with PFB on entry, with adjacent kitchen / meals area with upright gas oven and plenty of cupboard space, 3 large bedrooms all with built-in robes, centrally located bathroom. Add to this gas heating, solar panels, electric roller shutters on all windows and double lockup garage. A must inspection.

Description:
Jumpstart Your Property Dreams! (Receiver Auction)
If youre looking to break into the market or begin your very own investment portfolio, then dont go past this potential-packed property on 544m2! This home must be sold at auction, so now is the time to jumpstart your property dreams!
The Goldsworthy Convenience Store is a hop, skip, and a jump away for any last-minute groceries, while a brief drive to Corio Village will supply you with the big brands for all of your shopping needs. Fitness enthusiasts will love that the sporty Goldsworthy Reserve is just down the road, while the various Northern Bay College campuses provide education for your growing family. Close access to public transport and the Ring Road takes the hassle out of travelling.
The foundations are already in place for functional family living, however with a little TLC this home could transform into something wonderful.
The open plan living zone is well equipped for all seasons. Warmed by a Jindara wood heater, this space is a cosy retreat in the cool winter months, while glass sliding door access to the sheltered alfresco makes for great entertaining and relaxation during the warmer weather.
The alfresco is lined with ferns and unites with a timber deck, hinting at the true potential of this outdoor zone. Adjoining the open plan living, the lounge is perfectly positioned for busy parents keeping an eye on little ones!
The kitchen features a built-in pantry, dishwasher, and stainless steel appliances including a wall oven, gas hob, and rangehood.
The master bedroom is complete with a walk-in robe and en suite, while two additional bedrooms feature built-in robes. The main bathroom and laundry with ample storage complete the floorplan.
Ducted heating and ceiling fans provide modern comfort.
Featuring a north-facing backyard, green thumbs will be bursting with ideas to create their dream garden oasis. The secure backyard is complete with a garden shed, while the front garden offers a sense of privacy due to the high front fence.
A remote double lock-up garage with internal access also provides vehicle access to the backyard, accommodating for caravan, boat, or trailer storage.
So why wait any longer to secure your first home or start the investment portfolio youve always dreamt about? Inspect without delay!
Insights: 120 Goldsworthy Road, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2017 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Attention Investors and Developers
There's no time to waste to secure this neat and tidy low maintenance home which is set on a (approx.) 696m2 block in the residential growth zone (RGZ2) and offers you your next smart investment or lucrative development project (STCA).This light filled residence offers 2 bedrooms, living room, functional kitchen and bathroom plus a large rear yard, single garage and garden shed. This home represents a great buy and sound investment opportunity, located within walking distance to Corio Village Shopping Centre, Detroit Crescent shops, playgrounds, The Shell Club, schools, public transport and Princes Hwy for Melbourne commuters. Put this one on the top of your list as it won't last long.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist
Insights: 46 Bacchus Marsh Road, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2017 and 13 other 2 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
595m2 Corner Allotment!
Centrally positioned, just a moments walk to Corio Shopping Centre, medical facilities, public transport, sporting clubs & short drive to the Ring Road this property provides it all right at your front door. This charming 3 bedroom brick veneer home on an extremely generous 595m2 approx. corner allotment is sure to be a well sought after purchase.
If you're an investor, renovator or developer looking for a project that requires a little tender love and care but possesses the opportunity for fantastic financial growth look no further! Comprising of a spacious lounge with gas heating upon entry the home provides 3 bedrooms, central kitchen with meals area & bathroom. Outside lies a large garage with laundry perfect for parking or additional rumpus room, with plenty of rear yard still left over. Capitalise on the wonderful opportunity to purchase this great first home or investment that boasts plenty of appeal for all buyers. With such a large allotment this hidden gem is simply an ideal opportunity for those willing to put in the hard yards to let its true value shine through.
Photo ID Required
Insights: 44 Ontario Avenue, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2020 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
3br Family Home on Approx 612m2
On entry to this inviting family residence you can't help but feel at home. Simply perfect for those wanting to enter the market or investors looking for a tidy property to rent out straight away. Beautifully maintained, this much loved family home provides a comfortable living area, seperate kitchen/meals space, 3 generous bedrooms all serviced by BIR's, two with split system air conditioning and a gleaming central bathroom.
Outside comprises large rear yard with beautifully established gardens, enclosed entertaining area with a separate undercover alfresco and double garage, all situated on an impressive 612m2 approx. allotment.
Location is ideal, just a short stroll to the Corio Shopping Centre, excellent schools for all ages nearby, easy access to public transport as well as close proximity to the Ring Road and Princes Highway this home really does have it all!

A Renovated Delight!
In an ever convenient location, this home has very convenient access to the ring road, just a short stroll to Corio Central Shopping Centre & across the road from parkland and sporting facilities. Also enjoy the close proximity to schools, bus routes & health care just moments away.
-3 great sized bedrooms all with ceiling fans
-Large lounge which flows into the kitchen/dining area
-Fully renovated kitchen with gas stainless steel appliances
-Fully renovated bathroom with neutral colour palette
-Spacious grassed backyard with entertaining area and garden shed
-Currently tenanted at $270.00 per week until November 2017
This stylish home will be sure to impress!
**Please note, dishwasher is not included.

Description:
Prime Position and Potential
Take advantage today of this exceptional investment opportunity or ideal first home in a terrific location! Situated on an enormous 716m2 allotment on the very sought after Bacchus Marsh Road - directly opposite the Corio Shopping Centre and just a short stroll away to all other major facilities. This neat, much loved family home comprise of 3 generous bedrooms, central living area complete with gas heater, spacious kitchen, bathroom and separate laundry with WC adjacent. Outside provides an extensive blank canvas to use as you wish (STCA), with undercover alfresco area, single car garage, additional shed and carport. This well cared for home has everything you could need and more, you'll be hard pressed to find a better value property on the market - inspections are a must!

Description:
Quite Court Location!
Situated in a court location, this immaculate single-owner brick home with floating timber floors comprises 3 bedrooms, all with built-in-robes, and master with ensuite. Three generous zoned spaces include lounge, living and dining areas, while the kitchen features breakfast bar, wrap-around bench and ample storage. Modern comforts include a second central bathroom with separate shower and bath, gas ducted heating and 2 split-system inverters. Quality light fixtures and window furnishings complement this property, while a large rear yard encompasses garden shed and undercover entertainment area. A double lock-up garage completes this appealing property. A great opportunity to secure a solid home within close proximity of all amenities, transport and shops.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist
Insights: 9 Minehan Court, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2017 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Downsizers, First home Owner And Investors Dream
This impressive 4 Bedroom, 1 Bath, 2 Living DLUG home has everything you need and more.
Set in a quiet street it would suit young couple starting out or family, downsizer or investor with an estimated rent pw of $295
Comprising of a neat entry with fantastic built in storage and front living room, plus large Master bedroom at the front of the property.
Off the front living room is the fantastic functional kitchen comprising of Gas cooking , lots of cupboard and bench space, with meals area seating up to 6-8 people. Off the meals area is a cozy sitting room with smaller fourth bedroom
Down the hall you will find the main bathroom with separate toilet, 2 generous size bedrooms all with BIR plus the second living room, teenage retreat, games room at the back of the property.
Outside is a great size back yard with lots of room for kids and pets.
The undercover entertaining area is perfect for bbqs and is somewhere you can sit, relax and enjoy all year round with neat landscaped gardens.
A stones throw from the Melbourne Hwy, close to Schools, public transport and shopping center, this property is a must to inspect.
• 674m2
• Central Heating
• Sky lights
• Block out blinds
• DLUG
• 2 Living areas

Description:
Own Title Unit with Outstanding Returns!
This own title tidy 2 bedroom unit is a great investment opportunity or perfect for those looking to downsize and put the feet up. It offers 2 good sized bedrooms both with BIR. The tidy spacious kitchen is complete with stainless cooktop and dishwasher, large pantry and island bench overlooking the living dining area. Neat family bathroom with separate toilet The courtyard is spacious and low maintenance providing the ideal space for entertaining. With single lock up garage complete with BIR storage and partially carpeted this is a great opportunity to get into the market or grow your investment portfolio. Currently rented with fantastic tenants at 270 per week until December and with no body corporate this is about as low maintenance stress free living at you can get!

Description:
Ideal Investment Opportunity
If you're an investor, renovator or developer looking for a project that requires a little tender love and care but possesses the opportunity for fantastic financial growth look no further! Situated on a 623m2 allotment the home comprises of spacious front lounge with gas heater, central bathroom, 3 comfortable sized bedrooms, updated kitchen with views of the backyard & laundry. With an ample sized driveway, the extensive backyard provides a blank canvas to use as you wish with excellent potential for sub-division (STCA). This affordable home is simply bursting with potential, perfectly suited to first home buyers, renovators and investors. Conveniently located within walking distance to Corio Shopping Centre, the property offers easy access to public transport & just a short commute to Geelong's CBD.

Description:
Better Return Than the Bank
Attention to investors & downsizes, here is your opportunity to secure a well maintained 2 BR unit at such an affordable price point. The design of the unit is open and light filled boasting generous living flowing through to the spacious kitchen/meals area, featuring S/S appliances and comforted with S/S A/C. A sliding door provides access to the undercover outdoor entertaining area plus ample outdoor space. The 2 BRs are sizeable both with BIRs and serviced by the bathroom and separate laundry facilities. A SLUG completes this excellent unit which is sure to impress. The rental return is approx. $260 - $270 per week. Your bank manager will love these figures!

Description:
Elegance With Wow Factor!
Everything you want is waiting for you here at this 3 bedroom home in a great court location. Landscaped gardens greet you behind electric colour bond gates. Step inside to open plan living with floating floors, gas heating and reverse cycle split system in the lounge. Tiled dining has sliding doors to pergola flowing onto a very modern kitchen which will delight any avid cook shinning with stainless steel appliances plus plenty of storage drawers . 3 spacious bedrooms all have built in robes & privacy blinds. Central renovated bathroom with separate bath & shower.
Entertain all year around no matter what the weather is underneath the super sized pergola. A gated side yard perfect for a pool houses a large garden shed. On the other side of the yard is a double carport and an awesome 3 car garage to make your guy happy to set up his man cave, tinker in or park his toys. Behind the garage is another garden area perfect to sit, unwind or set up a hammock to escape the daily grind. Additional features are electric roller shutters, aluminium windows and water tank all sitting perfect on an approximate 550m2 allotment. Close to everything, shops, schools, medical facilities with easy access to the ring road you will be impressed.
Insights: 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Fantastic Home - In Prime Location!
This neat as a pin home sits on a whopping 700sqm (approx') block of land, situated within walking distance to a plethora of fabulous amenities such as Corio Village Shopping Centre, Swim and Leisure Centre, Medical Clinics, Primary and Secondary Schools including Geelong Grammar and Public Transport. Plus offers easy access to both the Melbourne and Ring Roads.
Constructed of pre-fabricated concrete slabs this much loved family home is a very solid investment for developers, investors or 1st home buyers. The home comprises 3 great sized bedrooms which are serviced by the main bathroom, featuring vanity and stand up double shower.
The spacious living zone offers heating and cooling to ensure comfortability all year around and the kitchen meals area offers a gas stove, wall oven and plenty of storage throughout. To the rear of the home is the large laundry room with a separate toilet.
Outside features a double lock-up garage with auto' roller door, garden shed, fernery and ample sized yard. Additional extras include: split system, gas heating and ceiling fans throughout. Expected rental potential is $240-$260 per week. Offers are welcome - vendor says "must sell!"
Insights: 37 Ontario Avenue, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2017 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Attention Keen Renovators & Developers!
Centrally located in Corio this home truly is in the centre of it all! Just a short stroll to Corio Central Shopping Centre, across the road from Northern Bay College & parklands, very convenient access to the highway bringing Geelongs CBD just 10 minutes away and Melbourne under an hour!
-3 bedrooms, 2 with BIRs, master with A/C
-Central bathroom, semi updated
-Outdoor alfresco, perfect for entertaining
-Single carport
-Lounge with A/C & gas heating
-Subdivision potential with 604sqm (approx.)
Dont miss this opportunity for the keen renovator!

Description:
Invest with confidence or ideal first home
Whether it is your first home or an investment to kick start or grow your portfolio, this is a property that commands your attention. Featuring spacious open plan kitchen/dining & living area, this property is sure to accommodate your every need. Providing you with split system heating & cooling that adds to the overall appeal. The functional and modernized kitchen has plenty of cupboard and bench space, plus a combined laundry and bathroom, and generous sized bedroom with built in robe. A second bedroom or study is also on offer. It boasts a private court yard with low maintenance garden. Off street parking is assured with a single carport and lock up storage room for added convenience all in this quiet and neatly kept complex. Perfectly located within easy distance to public transport, The Melbourne Road, schools & parks and the Geelong Ring Road.
Insights: 7/11-17 Howitt Avenue, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2017 and 13 other 2 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.
